channel.title: shortcodes on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in shortcodes on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds. YouTube Privacy Enhanced Shortcode The youtube shortcode embeds a responsive video player for YouTube videos. Only the ID of the video is required, e.g.: Twitter You want to include a single tweet into your blog post? Everything you need is the URL of the tweet:
